page.title: 15PARACHUTING - THE OBJECTIONS
page.content: Objections from locals are based on the level and type of noise produced by the aircraft as parachutists are ferried into the air with monotonous regularity. The constant drone, at an irritating pitch, takes place mostly at week-ends when people wish to relax in their gardens. Some farmers have also been affected by helmets, metal objects and stray parachutists dropping onto their fields. Many locals are also concerned about the adverse effect this may be having on the value of their property. Having chosen to live in such a quiet, unspoilt part of the country, many consider it very unfair that so many people must suffer such an intrusion just for the casual pleasure of a handful of people, many of whom do not even live in the county.
